summary: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.
cast: Jake Gyllenhaal|Michael Peña|Natalie Martinez|Anna Kendrick|David Harbour|Frank Grillo|America Ferrera|Cle Sloan|Jaime FitzSimons|Cody Horn|Shondrella Avery|Everton Lawrence|Leequwid 'Devil' Wilkens|James 'Pistol' McNeal|Zone|Alvin Norman|Richard Cabral|Diamonique|Maurice Compte|Flakiss|Manny Jimenez Jr.|Nikki Nicholle Barreras|Michael Monks|Hugh Daly|Kristy Wu|David Castañeda|Candace Smith|Serene Branson|Ramon Camacho|Kevin Vance|Corina Calderon|Eric Garcetti|David Fernandez Jr.|Nelly Castillo|McKinley Freeman|John A. Russo|Tom Spencer|Jeannie Aguilar|Patrizia Barretto|Clyde Broom Jr.|DTeflon|Kevin Dunigan|Judy Echavez|Pat Fitz|Robert Gatewood|Ruben Roberto Gomez|Danielle Hartnett|Chivonne Hill|Ted Hollis|Gene Hong|Curtis Jermaine|Sli Lewis|Diana Noris|Ron Roggé|Tony Sagastizado I|Tatiana Sarasty|Mauricio Solis|Jared Washington
title: Sin tregua
